articles.description: Q&A: Kenan Thompson talks about his cross-country commute, how much progress 'SNL' has made in diversity, favorite impressions and game-show sketches.
articles.content:
Kenan Thompson chats with USA TODAY's Bill Keveney about his new NBC comedy, "Kenan," and his record-long run on "Saturday Night Live."
USA TODAY
Many people hold down two jobs. Not many have a 3,0… [+5779 chars]
